subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous battles were fought during the Battle of Haldighati?
question_hi: हल्दिघट के दौरान कौन से नामक बाथों के मुख्य प्रमोदर हुए थे ?
A_en: Battle of Haldighati (1527) and Chittorgarh Fort (1535)
B_en: Battle of Haldighati (1527) and Battle of Amber (1556)
C_en: Battle of Haldighati (1527) and Battle of Ajmer (1576)
D_en: Battle of Haldighati (1527) and Battle of Khanwa (1527)
explanation_en: The correct answer is D. The Battle of Haldighati (1527) and Khanwa (1527) were two significant battles fought during Rana Pratap's reign. Battle of Haldighati occurred between Rana Pratap and Mughal Emperor Akbar, while Battle of Khanwa was fought between Rana Pratap and Sher Shah Suri.
explanation_hi: वहाँ उत्तम बात डी से समुद्र आदितां हैं | हल्दिघट (1527) और Khanwa (1527) हैं उत्तम बातों के बर्ने को आदितां हिए हैं | Rana Pratap aur Sher Shah Suri ki baar baar thi.
यहाँ स्प्राधिकरण डी से समुद्र आदितां हैं | Rana Pratap aur Sher Shah Suri ki baar baar thi. वहाँ उत्तम बातएं, Rana Pratap aur Sher Shah Suri ki baar baar thi.
